REASON: The usual from chemotherapy but most side-effects, except for hair loss, were curbed by Neulasta, Aranesp, Decadron, etc.
SIDE EFFECTS FOR GEMZAR: It was combined with taxol and carboplatin and knocked my cancer out in 2 months.  And I had been diagosed as stage-4 with 6-9 months to live.

RATING: metastatic bc to lungs and liver
SIDE EFFECTS FOR GEMZAR: I have been on gemzar for 13 weeks now.  My last ct showed significant improvement.  Hoping this drug works for a very long time!!
good response from gemzar after two other chemos drugs didnt work on my second relapse
